${ModID}:GreyBar获得.NAME: Grey Bar获得
${ModID}:GreyBar获得.DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your 抽牌堆 by Exhausting a card in your hand.
${ModID}:GreyBar获得.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your 抽牌堆 by Exhausting a card in your hand. NL 抽一张牌.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need a card to 消耗 。

${ModID}:ExtraLimbs.NAME: Extra Limbs
${ModID}:ExtraLimbs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL When Exhausted, increase the number of hits by 1 本场战斗. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:AncientSpear.NAME: Ancient Spear
${ModID}:AncientSpear.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:FleshLikeOak.NAME: Flesh Like Oak
${ModID}:FleshLikeOak.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! 点 力量. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.NAME: Call of the Grave
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random ${ModID}:Buried card and stslib:Purge it.
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, play a random ${ModID}:Buried card and stslib:Purge it.

${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.NAME: Spontaneous Ritual
${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards Exhausted 本场战斗.
${ModID}:SpontaneousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 *Dazed to your hand then Exhaust it. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards Exhausted 本场战斗.

${ModID}:FuneraryJewels.NAME: Funerary Jewels
${ModID}:FuneraryJewels.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 抽 !M! 张牌. 获得 [E]. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Tombstone.NAME: Tombstone
${ModID}:Tombstone.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:DarkOfNight.NAME: Dark of Night
${ModID}:DarkOfNight.DESCRIPTION: Your next card that Exhausts this turn is played twice.
${ModID}:DarkOfNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next two cards that Exhaust this turn are played twice.

${ModID}:LastGasp.NAME: Last Gasp
${ModID}:LastGasp.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL Choose a ${ModID}:Buried card, play it, and stslib:Purge it.
${ModID}:LastGasp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a ${ModID}:Buried card, play it, and stslib:Purge it.
